task.title: Adding contacts to my contact list
task.shortdesc: The contact list is a list of people with whom you frequently chat.

context.p: Add people to your contact list to easily connect with them. You can add someone who is in your organization to your contact list. You can also add someone with whom you have made a connection.
For example, you can invite a user from another organization to your network. After that person accepts your invitation, you can add them to your contact list.
To add someone to your contact list:

step.cmd: Click in the navigator, and select Contacts.
In the Search for contacts field, enter the full name or initial part of the person's name and click Search.
When the name that you want to add displays in the Search results, click the + icon.
Select the group to add the contact to in the Add to group field, and then click Add.

postreq.p:
To remove a name from your contact list, select it and then click
Remove from Contact List . Click Remove to confirm the removal.
